description: Hailing from Port Arthur, Texas, UGK are one of the pioneer "Southern rap" groups, exploding onto the scene in '92 with their independently released EP the Southern Way. The lead track, "Something Good," was a #1 radio record in Dallas, contributing to over 40,000 EP sales. The group, now picked up by Jive Records, release their 3rd album which features the tracks "Ride My Car," "Good Stuff," "Pinky Ring" and the first single, "One Day."
title: Ridin' Dirty Explicit Lyrics
